reviewText: I WAS NOT AWARE OF THE DIFFERENT REGIONS NOW THAT YOU HAVE TO CHECK ON ANY DISCS YOU ORDER.  I WILL NEVER ORDER ANYTHING FROM MOVIE MARS OR FROM AMAZON AFTER THIS HAPPENED.  THE SET IS IN FINE WORKING ORDER, I JUST REMOVED THE SHRINK WRAP TRYING TO MAKE THE DISC PLAY.  SO BEWARE AND CHECK BEFORE BUYING ANY DISCS.  GOOD LUCK IN THE FUTURE!
Can not play videos due to the fact that it's a foreign format..
